item.title: By: Blackbird Experience
item.dc:creator: Blackbird Experience
item.description: I'd love one! Where will you have them for sale? I gave all my previous ones away as xmas gifts. I suppose, a little stupid since I wanted one for my own! Never mind!
item.content:encoded: I’d love one! Where will you have them for sale? I gave all my previous ones away as xmas gifts. I suppose, a little stupid since I wanted one for my own! Never mind!
